issue.title: [C++] Remove remaining uses of ARROW_BOOST_VENDORED
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5687](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5687). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-5662 deprecated ARROW_BOOST_VENDORED but we still called it in a couple of places. This removes them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5687?focusedCommentId=16870345) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4656
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4656>
